    public class ThemeResourceReader
extends SafeResourceReader
implements org.apache.cocoon.caching.CacheableProcessingComponent, org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.Configurable
    An XMLUI Theme Resource Reader, which ONLY allows for certain types of files to be included in a themes.
    Author:
    Tim Donohue, Andrea Schweer
